name: Burnout Simulator
description:
---CONTROLS---

  • WASD / ZQSD  : Moving 
  • SPACE : action ( enter mini game / drink coffee )
  • C : Speak in corporate language

---MINI-GAME-CONTROLS AND NOTICE---

  • Repair Task : Use WASD / ZQSD to move the bug out of the computer by crossing the green line !
  • Meeting Task : succeed 2/3 keys on this QTE mini game with RTY keys
  • Printing Task : stop the slider above the blank zone with SPACE

90% of Sound FX are homemade again xD !

---How to play---

You have to do the employee tasks by succeeding the mini games for each task and up your corporate score !

The mini game up your burnout bar a bit ( but beware if you loose them the burnout bar will explode ! ) 

Each mini games are explain above !

Tips : When you play a mini game the time no longer runs during this time laps
Tips : Take coffee when it's available ;) ! 

---Story---

Burnout is a real problem of our century ! 

The goal is simple : You play a corporate dude that want to do his work well but how long can you do that ?
